ISSUE.TITLE: Country 'Croatia (HR)' should be 'Subject to VAT'
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Croatia does not install with Subject to VAT Flag. https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/c8dff865418b9e9c6b21db69ab61d58161a74308/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Installation/ISO3166.cs#L106 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Union_value_added_tax

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5551 Add setting to disable specification filters (#5918)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5927 Changed "Subject to VAT" flag of Croatia and United Kingdom
